summary: A Standalone set of Elven Scout Mithril Chain Shirts and Diviner Robes
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35174-1-1366777547.jpg[/img]
[center][color=lightblue][font=Palatino Linotype][size=4]
A Standalone set of Elven ~ Mithril Chain Shirts and Diviner Robes ~ Requires Dragonborn
[/size][/font][/color][/center]

[center][color=lightgreen][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
Variants Include ~
Elven Diviner Robes
Elven Scout Armor ~ Winter
Elven Scout Armor ~ Autumn
Elven Scout Armor ~ Spring
Elven Scout Armor ~ Summer
Elven Scout Armor ~ High Elf
Elven Scout Armor ~ Noldorian
Elven Scout Armor ~ Ceremonial
Elven Scout Armor ~ Shadow
[/size][/font][/color][/center]

[center][color=lightblue][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
This Metalized Effect really needs to be seen in game to be appreciated, it reflects the environs!
[/size][/font][/color][/center]

[center][youtube]IRFoRBOGLws[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/35174-2-1366777547.png[/img]

[center][color=lightgreen][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
Find them ~
In Levelled Lists - Boss Chests & Blacksmith Vendors
In a chest inside the left door, to the left, in High Hrothgar
In a chest in QA Smoke underneath the alchemy table (coc qasmoke - coc riverwood)
[/size][/font][/color][/center]


[color=lightblue][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
New Diffise Chainmail Texture DXT 1 & 3 @ 2048
New Normal Map Texture DXT 5 @ 2048
New Metal Map DXT 1 @ 2048
New Cube Map DXT 1 @ 256 x 256
The base mesh's comes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F

%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D34074]Newerminds Light Elven Armor [/url]
Floral skirt and shoulder tetxure sampled from Newermind
Arms Strap Texture Sampled from Cabal
Noldorian Recolour by Etchelion
[/size][/font][/color]

[center][color=lightgreen][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
Note

The Chainmail textures look best with ENB Reflections turned on so use an up to date enb Binary that includes the new reflection settings.
ENB Reflections are the best thing since sliced bread, so ditch those old ENBâ€™s and choose an up to date one <3

Using Wrye Bash to Create a Bash Patch to Merge Level Lists is highly recommended
[/size][/font][/color][/center]


[color=lightblue][font=Palatino Linotype][size=3]
Credits
ZzJay - For being my Lil Sister
Nerwermind for the Meshes
Xenius Chainmail
Cabal for arm strap texture
Etchelion for Noldorian Recolour
MTIchenor for Friendship
[/size][/font][/color]
author: Grace Darkling
